name: Displaced Defense
description:
Thank you for coming to my page! My name is Austin and I solely developed this game. I hope to improve my skills and make better games. I appreciate you giving my game interest!

Displaced Defense is a traditional, open-world, turn-based RPG. The combat is not meant to be easy and sometimes normal enemies may seem challenging. Use your strategy of enemy weaknesses, classes, and skills to get back home!

Features:

12 Classes and Multiclassing: All classes are available at the beginning of the game. Your character will change appearance based on your primary class. Equip
a secondary class to gain stats and access to their skills!

A combination of leveling up and battles will gain you resources to purchase skills in any order you choose. Build your characters to withstand the hard battles
ahead!

Open World: The enemies scale with your level and you are free to explore the world to find the story of this new land.

Crafting: There is no one waiting to sell you gear here! Materials will drop off enemies that you can use to craft equipmen**t. The materials scale depending on party level. There is a vendor in the Beginner’s Hall to purchase older materials in case you out level them!

Good luck to you and thank you for exploring my world!
